name: QuickReply
description:
QuickReply.ai is omni-channel Marketing and communicaiton Automation platform over WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, SMS, RCS and website widgets.

Trusted by over 700 brands across India, Europe, the Middle East, and South East Asia, QuickReply.ai has evolved through constant feedback from reputable brands.
focus_areas: Bulk & Drip Campaigns - Support for both 1-way or 2-way campaigns with detailed contact by contact insights
Automated Chatbots with a human fallback option
Shared Team Inbox with Priority Inbox and Chat Rounting
